title: ICE: Can't to use a reference of a type that implements `Allocator` as an allocator.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code [Playground](https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=nightly&mode=debug&edition=2021&gist=738f2c119096284ab5d7aba6ce523295) ```Rust #![feature(allocator_api)] use std::alloc::{AllocError, Allocator, Layout, System}; use std::ptr::NonNull; use std::boxed::Box; struct Alloc; unsafe impl Allocator for Alloc { fn allocate(&self, layout: Layout) -> Result, AllocError> { System.allocate(layout) } unsafe fn deallocate(&self, ptr: NonNull, layout: Layout) { System.deallocate(ptr, layout) } } fn main() { let alloc = Alloc; let boxed = Box::new_in(10, alloc.by_ref()); } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.59.0-nightly (475b00aa4 2021-12-24) binary: rustc commit-hash: 475b00aa4037461b506539a06d15ca6091b461a7 commit-date: 2021-12-24 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.59.0-nightly LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: i < this.fields.count()', /rustc/c09a9529c51cde41c1101e56049d418edb07bf71/compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/layout.rs:2311:21 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/c09a9529c51cde41c1101e56049d418edb07bf71/library/std/src/panicking.rs:498:5 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt at /rustc/c09a9529c51cde41c1101e56049d418edb07bf71/library/core/src/panicking.rs:107:14 2: core::panicking::panic at /rustc/c09a9529c51cde41c1101e56049d418edb07bf71/library/core/src/panicking.rs:48:5 3: <&rustc_middle::ty::TyS as rustc_target::abi::TyAbiInterface<_>>::ty_and_layout_field::field_ty_or_layout:: 4: as rustc_codegen_llvm::type_of::LayoutLlvmExt>::scalar_pair_element_llvm_type 5: as rustc_codegen_llvm::type_of::LayoutLlvmExt>::scalar_pair_element_llvm_type 6: as rustc_codegen_llvm::type_of::LayoutLlvmExt>::llvm_type 7: as rustc_codegen_llvm::type_of::LayoutLlvmExt>::llvm_type 8: as rustc_codegen_llvm::abi::FnAbiLlvmExt>::llvm_type 9: ::predefine_fn 10: rustc_codegen_llvm::base::compile_codegen_unit::module_codegen 11: >::with_task::> 12: rustc_codegen_llvm::base::compile_codegen_unit 13: ::codegen_crate 14: ::time::, rustc_interface::passes::start_codegen::{closure#0}> 15: ::ongoing_codegen 16: ::enter::, rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> 17: rustc_span::with_source_map::, rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#1}> 18: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}> 19: >::set::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> ```
